ygData.subject: GemCutter probably not functional at the moment...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Folks, Made another gem chopper last night. Tried picking up the chopper and right clicking over a perl and nothing happened. Tried manipulating it several
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Folks,

Made another gem chopper last night. Tried picking up the chopper and right clicking over a perl and nothing happened. Tried manipulating it several other ways with no results.

If any of you guys have any other 'non-destructive' ideas for the gems chopper let me know and I'll try them out.

After I made the chopper, I gave GM 'NYXX' of Tunare a buzz and out right asked him if the gem chopper is a functional item at the moment or should I wait for another patch. He told me, "I dont think that it is functional right now".

Now admittedly a GM's word is not neccesarily law, but this is proof enough for me to wait for a future patch before we start destroying more gemcutters.

"How many gems can ya chop if gemchopper dont chop gems?" bah...

Cheers,

FizzWizz
Jaded Master Tinker of Tunare
